alert.note: Alert for Northern Centre; Northern Clinton; Southern Centre; Southern Clinton (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 4:58PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN CENTRE AND SOUTHERN CLINTON COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM EDT... At 458 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lock Haven, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Lock Haven, Carroll, Lamar, Mill Hall, Dunnstown, Flemington, Castanea, Blanchard, Monument, Mackeyville, Bald Eagle State Park, Beech Creek, Loganton, Orviston and Lock Haven University. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central Pennsylvania.

area.areaDesc: Northern Centre; Northern Clinton; Southern Centre; Southern Clinton
